about_the_game:
Light up the lake with the new radiating Synthwave Cosmetic Pack. With the Synthwave wrap you will blaze and glow neon, bringing your bass fishing to an electrifying new level.

Deck your boat and angler out today with the Synthwave boat wrap, special neon strip clothing, and the first ever pair of in-game glowing shoes to match. The cosmetic pack also comes with a set of unique Mastery Challenges so you can unlock an exclusive pair of fluorescent glasses through a variety of fishing challenges.

Night-time’s not for sleeping anymore, head out to the water, find those midnight lunkers and let the neon spill across the water.

Light up the competition with:


  • The first ever emissive neon Synthwave Boat Wrap
  • New in-game Glasses that glow
  • Synthwave designed Cap
  • Special Synthwave T-shirt
  • Unique Synthwave Pants with light up strips
  • Brand new light up Sneakers
  • Download size: 2.4KB

Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass


Want more Retro styled cosmetics? Pick up the Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass today and get access to 3 great new cosmetic packs.

  • Synthwave Pack
  • Pixel Pro Pack
  • Throwback B.A.S.S.® Pack

Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave boat wrap, pick your Pixel Pro with the new pixel art Elite anglers, or flashback to old school Bassmaster® with the Throwback B.A.S.S.® pack and kit your angler & boat out with vintage patches from the early days of Bassmaster®.
detailed_description:
Light up the lake with the new radiating Synthwave Cosmetic Pack. With the Synthwave wrap you will blaze and glow neon, bringing your bass fishing to an electrifying new level.

Deck your boat and angler out today with the Synthwave boat wrap, special neon strip clothing, and the first ever pair of in-game glowing shoes to match. The cosmetic pack also comes with a set of unique Mastery Challenges so you can unlock an exclusive pair of fluorescent glasses through a variety of fishing challenges.

Night-time’s not for sleeping anymore, head out to the water, find those midnight lunkers and let the neon spill across the water.

Light up the competition with:


  • The first ever emissive neon Synthwave Boat Wrap
  • New in-game Glasses that glow

  • Special Synthwave T-shirt

Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass


Want more Retro styled cosmetics? Pick up the Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass today and get access to 3 great new cosmetic packs.

  • Synthwave Pack

Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave boat wrap, pick your Pixel Pro with the new pixel art Elite anglers, or flashback to old school Bassmaster® with the Throwback B.A.S.S.® pack and kit your angler & boat out with vintage patches from the early days of Bassmaster®.

name: Bassmaster® Fishing 2022: Synthwave Pack

subs.option_text: Bassmaster® Fishing 2022: Retro Cosmetic Pack Season Pass - $10.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2Gb dedicated video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Light up the lake with the radiating Synthwave Cosmetic Pack. With the Synthwave boat wrap, clothing, and glasses, you will glow neon bringing your bass fishing to an electrifying new level. Night-time’s not for sleeping anymore, find those midnight lunkers and let the neon spill across the water.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
